original: 10,008.121c tad rajas tumulaṃ ghoraṃ kṣaṇenāntaradhīyata
analyzed: tat rajaḥ tumulam ghoram kṣaṇena antaradhīyata

original: 10,008.122a saṃveṣṭamānān udvignān nirutsāhān sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: saṃveṣṭamānān udvignān nirutsāhān sahasraśas

original: 10,008.122c nyapātayan narān kruddhaḥ paśūn paśupatir yathā
analyzed: nyapātayat narān kruddhaḥ paśūn paśupatiḥ yathā

original: 10,008.123a anyonyaṃ saṃpariṣvajya śayānān dravato 'parān
analyzed: anyonyam saṃpariṣvajya śayānān parān

original: 10,008.123c saṃlīnān yudhyamānāṃś ca sarvān drauṇir apothayat
analyzed: saṃlīnān yudhyamānān ca sarvān drauṇiḥ apothayat

original: 10,008.124a dahyamānā hutāśena vadhyamānāś ca tena te
analyzed: dahyamānāḥ hutāśena vadhyamānāḥ ca tena te

original: 10,008.124c parasparaṃ tadā yodhā anayan yamasādanam
analyzed: parasparam tadā yodhāḥ anayan yama sādanam

original: 10,008.125a tasyā rajanyās tv ardhena pāṇḍavānāṃ mahad balam

original: 10,008.125c gamayām āsa rājendra drauṇir yamaniveśanam
analyzed: gamayām āsa rāja indra drauṇiḥ yama niveśanam

original: 10,008.126a niśācarāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sa rātrir harṣavardhinī
analyzed: niśā carāṇām sattvānām sa rātriḥ harṣa vardhinī

original: 10,008.126c āsīn naragajāśvānāṃ raudrī kṣayakarī bhṛśam
analyzed: āsīt nara gaja aśvānām raudrī kṣaya karī bhṛśam

original: 10,008.127a tatrādṛśyanta rakṣāṃsi piśācāś ca pṛthagvidhāḥ
analyzed: tatra adṛśyanta rakṣāṃsi piśācāḥ ca pṛthagvidhāḥ

original: 10,008.127c khādanto naramāṃsāni pibantaḥ śoṇitāni ca
analyzed: khādantaḥ nara māṃsāni pibantaḥ śoṇitāni ca

original: 10,008.128a karālāḥ piṅgalā raudrāḥ śailadantā rajasvalāḥ
analyzed: karālāḥ piṅgalāḥ raudrāḥ śaila dantāḥ rajasvalāḥ

original: 10,008.128c jaṭilā dīrghasakthāś ca pañcapādā mahodarāḥ
analyzed: jaṭilāḥ dīrgha sakthāḥ ca pañca pādāḥ mahā udarāḥ

original: 10,008.129a paścād aṅgulayo rūkṣā virūpā bhairavasvanāḥ
analyzed: paścāt aṅgulayaḥ rūkṣāḥ virūpāḥ bhairava svanāḥ

original: 10,008.129c ghaṭajānavo 'tihrasvāś ca nīlakaṇṭhā vibhīṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: ghaṭa jānavaḥ ti hrasvāḥ ca nīla kaṇṭhāḥ vibhīṣaṇāḥ

original: 10,008.130a saputradārāḥ sukrūrā durdarśanasunirghṛṇāḥ
analyzed: sa putra dārāḥ su krūrāḥ durdarśana su nirghṛṇāḥ

original: 10,008.130c vividhāni ca rūpāṇi tatrādṛśyanta rakṣasām
analyzed: vividhāni ca rūpāṇi tatra adṛśyanta rakṣasām

original: 10,008.131a pītvā ca śoṇitaṃ hṛṣṭāḥ prānṛtyan gaṇaśo 'pare
analyzed: pītvā ca śoṇitam hṛṣṭāḥ prānṛtyan pare

original: 10,008.131c idaṃ varam idaṃ medhyam idaṃ svādv iti cābruvan
analyzed: idam varam idam medhyam idam svādu iti ca abruvan

original: 10,008.132a medomajjāsthiraktānāṃ vasānāṃ ca bhṛśāsitāḥ
analyzed: medaḥ majja asthi raktānām vasānām ca bhṛśa āsitāḥ

original: 10,008.132c paramāṃsāni khādantaḥ kravyādā māṃsajīvinaḥ
analyzed: para māṃsāni khādantaḥ kravyādāḥ māṃsa jīvinaḥ

original: 10,008.133a vasāṃ cāpy apare pītvā paryadhāvan vikukṣilāḥ
analyzed: vasām ca api apare pītvā paryadhāvan vikukṣilāḥ

original: 10,008.133c nānāvaktrās tathā raudrāḥ kravyādāḥ piśitāśinaḥ
analyzed: nānā vaktrāḥ tathā raudrāḥ kravyādāḥ piśita āśinaḥ

original: 10,008.134a ayutāni ca tatrāsan prayutāny arbudāni ca
analyzed: ayutāni ca tatra āsan prayutāni arbudāni ca

original: 10,008.134c rakṣasāṃ ghorarūpāṇāṃ mahatāṃ krūrakarmaṇām
analyzed: rakṣasām ghora rūpāṇām mahatām krūra karmaṇām

original: 10,008.135a muditānāṃ vitṛptānāṃ tasmin mahati vaiśase
analyzed: muditānām vitṛptānām tasmin mahati vaiśase

original: 10,008.135c sametāni bahūny āsan bhūtāni ca janādhipa
analyzed: sametāni bahūni āsan bhūtāni ca janādhipa

original: 10,008.136a pratyūṣakāle śibirāt pratigantum iyeṣa saḥ

original: 10,008.136c nṛśoṇitāvasiktasya drauṇer āsīd asitsaruḥ
analyzed: nṛ śoṇita avasiktasya drauṇeḥ āsīt asi tsaruḥ

original: 10,008.136e pāṇinā saha saṃśliṣṭa ekībhūta iva prabho
analyzed: pāṇinā saha saṃśliṣṭaḥ ekībhūtaḥ iva prabho

original: 10,008.137a sa niḥśeṣān arīn kṛtvā virarāja janakṣaye
analyzed: sa niḥśeṣān arīn kṛtvā virarāja jana kṣaye

original: 10,008.137c yugānte sarvabhūtāni bhasma kṛtveva pāvakaḥ
analyzed: yuga ante sarva bhūtāni bhasma kṛtvā iva pāvakaḥ

original: 10,008.138a yathāpratijñaṃ tat karma kṛtvā drauṇāyaniḥ prabho
analyzed: yathāpratijñam tat karma kṛtvā drauṇāyaniḥ prabho

original: 10,008.138c durgamāṃ padavīṃ kṛtvā pitur āsīd gatajvaraḥ
analyzed: durgamām padavīm kṛtvā pituḥ āsīt gata jvaraḥ

original: 10,008.139a yathaiva saṃsuptajane śibire prāviśan niśi
analyzed: yathā eva saṃsupta jane śibire prāviśat niśi

original: 10,008.139c tathaiva hatvā niḥśabde niścakrāma nararṣabhaḥ
analyzed: tathā eva hatvā niḥśabde niścakrāma nara ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 10,008.140a niṣkramya śibirāt tasmāt tābhyāṃ saṃgamya vīryavān
analyzed: niṣkramya śibirāt tasmāt tābhyām saṃgamya vīryavān

original: 10,008.140c ācakhyau karma tat sarvaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ saṃharṣayan vibho
analyzed: ācakhyau karma tat sarvam hṛṣṭaḥ saṃharṣayan vibho

original: 10,008.141a tāv apy ācakhyatus tasmai priyaṃ priyakarau tadā
analyzed: tau api ācakhyatuḥ tasmai priyam priya karau tadā

original: 10,008.141c pāñcālān sṛñjayāṃś caiva vinikṛttān sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: pāñcālān sṛñjayān ca eva vinikṛttān sahasraśas

original: 10,008.141e prītyā coccair udakrośaṃs tathaivāsphoṭayaṃs talān
analyzed: prītyā ca uccais udakrośan tathā eva asphoṭayan talān

original: 10,008.142a evaṃvidhā hi sā rātriḥ somakānāṃ janakṣaye
analyzed: evaṃvidhā hi sā rātriḥ somakānām jana kṣaye

original: 10,008.142c prasuptānāṃ pramattānām āsīt subhṛśadāruṇā
analyzed: prasuptānām pramattānām āsīt su bhṛśa dāruṇā

original: 10,008.143a asaṃśayaṃ hi kālasya paryāyo duratikramaḥ
analyzed: asaṃśayam hi kālasya paryāyaḥ duratikramaḥ

original: 10,008.143c tādṛśā nihatā yatra kṛtvāsmākaṃ janakṣayam
analyzed: tādṛśāḥ nihatāḥ yatra kṛtvā asmākam jana kṣayam

original: 10,008.144 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca

original: 10,008.144a prāg eva sumahat karma drauṇir etan mahārathaḥ
analyzed: prāk eva su mahat karma drauṇiḥ etat mahā rathaḥ

original: 10,008.144c nākarod īdṛśaṃ kasmān matputravijaye dhṛtaḥ
analyzed: na akarot īdṛśam kasmāt mad putra vijaye dhṛtaḥ

original: 10,008.145a atha kasmād dhate kṣatre karmedaṃ kṛtavān asau
analyzed: atha kasmāt hate kṣatre karma idam kṛtavān asau

original: 10,008.145c droṇaputro maheṣvāsas tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
analyzed: droṇaputraḥ mahā iṣvāsaḥ tat me śaṃsitum arhasi

original: 10,008.146 saṃjaya uvāca
analyzed: saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: 10,008.146a teṣāṃ nūnaṃ bhayān nāsau kṛtavān kurunandana
analyzed: teṣām nūnam bhayāt na asau kṛtavān kuru nandana

original: 10,008.146c asāṃnidhyād dhi pārthānāṃ keśavasya ca dhīmataḥ
analyzed: asāṃnidhyāt hi pārthānām keśavasya ca dhīmataḥ

original: 10,008.147a sātyakeś cāpi karmedaṃ droṇaputreṇa sādhitam
analyzed: sātyakeḥ ca api karma idam droṇaputreṇa sādhitam

original: 10,008.147c na hi teṣāṃ samakṣaṃ tān hanyād api marutpatiḥ
analyzed: na hi teṣām samakṣam tān hanyāt api marutpatiḥ

original: 10,008.148a etad īdṛśakaṃ vṛttaṃ rājan suptajane vibho
analyzed: etat īdṛśakam vṛttam rājan supta jane vibho

original: 10,008.148c tato janakṣayaṃ kṛtvā pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātyayam

original: 10,008.148e diṣṭyā diṣṭyeti cānyonyaṃ sametyocur mahārathāḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā diṣṭyā iti ca anyonyam sametya ūcuḥ mahā rathāḥ

original: 10,008.149a paryaṣvajat tato drauṇis tābhyāṃ ca pratinanditaḥ
analyzed: paryaṣvajat tatas drauṇiḥ tābhyām ca pratinanditaḥ

original: 10,008.149c idaṃ harṣāc ca sumahad ādade vākyam uttamam
analyzed: idam harṣāt ca su mahat ādade vākyam uttamam

original: 10,008.150a pāñcālā nihatāḥ sarve draupadeyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: pāñcālāḥ nihatāḥ sarve draupadeyāḥ ca sarvaśas

original: 10,008.150c somakā matsyaśeṣāś ca sarve vinihatā mayā
analyzed: somakāḥ matsya śeṣāḥ ca sarve vinihatāḥ mayā

original: 10,008.151a idānīṃ kṛtakṛtyāḥ sma yāma tatraiva māciram
analyzed: idānīm kṛtakṛtyāḥ sma yāma tatra eva māciram

original: 10,008.151c yadi jīvati no rājā tasmai śaṃsāmahe priyam
analyzed: yadi jīvati naḥ rājā tasmai śaṃsāmahe priyam

original: 10,009.001 saṃjaya uvāca
analyzed: saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: 10,009.001a te hatvā sarvapāñcālān draupadeyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: te hatvā sarva pāñcālān draupadeyān ca sarvaśas

original: 10,009.001c agacchan sahitās tatra yatra duryodhano hataḥ
analyzed: agacchan sahitāḥ tatra yatra duryodhanaḥ hataḥ

original: 10,009.002a gatvā cainam apaśyaṃs te kiṃ cit prāṇaṃ narādhipam
analyzed: gatvā ca enam apaśyan te kim cit prāṇam narādhipam

original: 10,009.002c tato rathebhyaḥ praskandya parivavrus tavātmajam

original: 10,009.003a taṃ bhagnasakthaṃ rājendra kṛcchraprāṇam acetasam

original: 10,009.003c vamantaṃ rudhiraṃ vaktrād apaśyan vasudhātale

original: 10,009.004a vṛtaṃ samantād bahubhiḥ śvāpadair ghoradarśanaiḥ
analyzed: vṛtam samantāt bahubhiḥ śvāpadaiḥ ghora darśanaiḥ

original: 10,009.004c śālāvṛkagaṇaiś caiva bhakṣayiṣyadbhir antikāt
analyzed: śālāvṛka gaṇaiḥ ca eva bhakṣayiṣyadbhiḥ antikāt

original: 10,009.005a nivārayantaṃ kṛcchrāt tāñ śvāpadān saṃcikhādiṣūn
analyzed: nivārayantam kṛcchrāt tām śvāpadān saṃcikhādiṣūn

original: 10,009.005c viveṣṭamānaṃ mahyāṃ ca subhṛśaṃ gāḍhavedanam
analyzed: viveṣṭamānam mahyām ca su bhṛśam gāḍha vedanam

original: 10,009.006a taṃ śayānaṃ mahātmānaṃ bhūmau svarudhirokṣitam
analyzed: tam śayānam mahātmānam bhūmau sva rudhira ukṣitam

original: 10,009.006c hataśiṣṭās trayo vīrāḥ śokārtāḥ paryavārayan
analyzed: hata śiṣṭāḥ trayaḥ vīrāḥ śoka ārtāḥ paryavārayan

original: 10,009.006e aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
analyzed: aśvatthāmā kṛpaḥ ca eva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ

original: 10,009.007a tais tribhiḥ śoṇitādigdhair niḥśvasadbhir mahārathaiḥ
analyzed: taiḥ tribhiḥ śoṇita ādigdhaiḥ niḥśvasadbhiḥ mahā rathaiḥ

original: 10,009.007c śuśubhe saṃvṛto rājā vedī tribhir ivāgnibhiḥ
analyzed: śuśubhe saṃvṛtaḥ rājā vedī tribhiḥ iva agnibhiḥ

original: 10,009.008a te taṃ śayānaṃ saṃprekṣya rājānam atathocitam
analyzed: te tam śayānam saṃprekṣya rājānam a tathā ucitam

original: 10,009.008a*0040_01 duḥkhād aśrūṇy amuñcanta niḥśvāsaparamā nṛpaḥ
analyzed: duḥkhāt aśrūṇi amuñcanta niḥśvāsa paramāḥ nṛpaḥ

original: 10,009.008c aviṣahyena duḥkhena tatas te rurudus trayaḥ
analyzed: aviṣahyena duḥkhena tatas te ruruduḥ trayaḥ

original: 10,009.009a tatas te rudhiraṃ hastair mukhān nirmṛjya tasya ha
analyzed: tatas te rudhiram hastaiḥ mukhāt nirmṛjya tasya ha

original: 10,009.009c raṇe rājñaḥ śayānasya kṛpaṇaṃ paryadevayan
analyzed: raṇe rājñaḥ śayānasya kṛpaṇam paryadevayan

original: 10,009.010 kṛpa uvāca
analyzed: kṛpaḥ uvāca

original: 10,009.010a na daivasyātibhāro 'sti yad ayaṃ rudhirokṣitaḥ
analyzed: na daivasya atibhāraḥ asti yat ayam rudhira ukṣitaḥ

original: 10,009.010c ekādaśacamūbhartā śete duryodhano hataḥ
analyzed: ekādaśa camū bhartā śete duryodhanaḥ hataḥ

original: 10,009.011a paśya cāmīkarābhasya cāmīkaravibhūṣitām
analyzed: paśya cāmīkara ābhasya cāmīkara vibhūṣitām

original: 10,009.011c gadāṃ gadāpriyasyemāṃ samīpe patitāṃ bhuvi
analyzed: gadām gadāpriyasya imām samīpe patitām bhuvi

original: 10,009.012a iyam enaṃ gadā śūraṃ na jahāti raṇe raṇe
analyzed: iyam enam gadā śūram na jahāti raṇe raṇe

original: 10,009.012c svargāyāpi vrajantaṃ hi na jahāti yaśasvinam

original: 10,009.013a paśyemāṃ saha vīreṇa jāmbūnadavibhūṣitām
analyzed: paśya imām saha vīreṇa jāmbūnada vibhūṣitām

original: 10,009.013c śayānāṃ śayane dharme bhāryāṃ prītimatīm iva
analyzed: śayānām śayane dharme bhāryām prītimatīm iva

original: 10,009.014a yo vai mūrdhāvasiktānām agre yātaḥ paraṃtapaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vai mūrdhāvasiktānām agre yātaḥ paraṃtapaḥ

original: 10,009.014c sa hato grasate pāṃsūn paśya kālasya paryayam
analyzed: sa hataḥ grasate pāṃsūn paśya kālasya paryayam

original: 10,009.015a yenājau nihatā bhūmāv aśerata purā dviṣaḥ
analyzed: yena ājau nihatāḥ bhūmau aśerata purā dviṣaḥ

original: 10,009.015c sa bhūmau nihataḥ śete kururājaḥ parair ayam
analyzed: sa bhūmau nihataḥ śete kuru rājaḥ paraiḥ ayam

original: 10,009.016a bhayān namanti rājāno yasya sma śatasaṃghaśaḥ
analyzed: bhayāt namanti rājānaḥ yasya sma śata saṃghaśas

original: 10,009.016c sa vīraśayane śete kravyādbhiḥ parivāritaḥ
analyzed: sa vīra śayane śete kravyādbhiḥ parivāritaḥ

original: 10,009.017a upāsata nṛpāḥ pūrvam arthahetor yam īśvaram
analyzed: upāsata nṛpāḥ pūrvam artha hetoḥ yam īśvaram

original: 10,009.017c dhik sadyo nihataḥ śete paśya kālasya paryayam
analyzed: dhik sadyas nihataḥ śete paśya kālasya paryayam

original: 10,009.017c*0041_01 tam upāsyanty araṇye 'dya mṛgagomāyavaḥ sma ha
analyzed: tam upāsyanti araṇye dya mṛga gomāyavaḥ sma ha

original: 10,009.017c*0042_01 upāsate ca taṃ hy adya kravyādā māṃsahetavaḥ

original: 10,009.017c*0043_01 tam upāsanta kauravyaṃ kravyādā māṃsagṛddhinaḥ
analyzed: tam upāsanta kauravyam kravyādāḥ māṃsa gṛddhinaḥ

original: 10,009.018 saṃjaya uvāca
analyzed: saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: 10,009.018a taṃ śayānaṃ nṛpaśreṣṭhaṃ tato bharatasattama
analyzed: tam śayānam nṛpa śreṣṭham tatas bharata sattama

original: 10,009.018c aśvatthāmā samālokya karuṇaṃ paryadevayat
analyzed: aśvatthāmā samālokya karuṇam paryadevayat

original: 10,009.019a āhus tvāṃ rājaśārdūla mukhyaṃ sarvadhanuṣmatām
analyzed: āhuḥ tvām rāja śārdūla mukhyam sarva dhanuṣmatām

original: 10,009.019c dhanādhyakṣopamaṃ yuddhe śiṣyaṃ saṃkarṣaṇasya ha
analyzed: dhanādhyakṣa upamam yuddhe śiṣyam saṃkarṣaṇasya ha

original: 10,009.020a kathaṃ vivaram adrākṣīd bhīmasenas tavānagha
analyzed: katham vivaram adrākṣīt bhīmasenaḥ tava anagha

original: 10,009.020c balinaḥ kṛtino nityaṃ sa ca pāpātmavān nṛpa
analyzed: balinaḥ kṛtinaḥ nityam sa ca pāpa ātmavān nṛpa

original: 10,009.021a kālo nūnaṃ mahārāja loke 'smin balavattaraḥ
analyzed: kālaḥ nūnam mahā rāja loke smin balavattaraḥ

original: 10,009.021c paśyāmo nihataṃ tvāṃ ced bhīmasenena saṃyuge
analyzed: paśyāmaḥ nihatam tvām ced bhīmasenena saṃyuge

original: 10,009.022a kathaṃ tvāṃ sarvadharmajñaṃ kṣudraḥ pāpo vṛkodaraḥ
analyzed: katham tvām sarva dharma jñam kṣudraḥ pāpaḥ vṛkodaraḥ

original: 10,009.022c nikṛtyā hatavān mando nūnaṃ kālo duratyayaḥ
analyzed: nikṛtyā hatavān mandaḥ nūnam kālaḥ duratyayaḥ

original: 10,009.023a dharmayuddhe hy adharmeṇa samāhūyaujasā mṛdhe
analyzed: dharma yuddhe hi adharmeṇa samāhūya ojasā mṛdhe

analyzed: tām upetya nirānandām duḥkha śoka samanvitām

original: 10,016.024c parivārya vyatiṣṭhanta pāṇḍavāḥ sahakeśavāḥ
analyzed: parivārya vyatiṣṭhanta pāṇḍavāḥ saha keśavāḥ

original: 10,016.025a tato rājñābhyanujñāto bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
analyzed: tatas rājñā abhyanujñātaḥ bhīmasenaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 10,016.025c pradadau tu maṇiṃ divyaṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
analyzed: pradadau tu maṇim divyam vacanam ca idam abravīt

original: 10,016.026a ayaṃ bhadre tava maṇiḥ putrahantā jitaḥ sa te
analyzed: ayam bhadre tava maṇiḥ putra hantā jitaḥ sa te

original: 10,016.026c uttiṣṭha śokam utsṛjya kṣatradharmam anusmara
analyzed: uttiṣṭha śokam utsṛjya kṣatra dharmam anusmara

original: 10,016.027a prayāṇe vāsudevasya śamārtham asitekṣaṇe
analyzed: prayāṇe vāsudevasya śama artham asita īkṣaṇe

original: 10,016.027c yāny uktāni tvayā bhīru vākyāni madhughātinaḥ
analyzed: yāni uktāni tvayā bhīru vākyāni madhughātinaḥ

original: 10,016.028a naiva me patayaḥ santi na putrā bhrātaro na ca
analyzed: na eva me patayaḥ santi na putrāḥ bhrātaraḥ na ca

original: 10,016.028c naiva tvam api govinda śamam icchati rājani
analyzed: nā eva tvam api govinda śamam icchati rājani

original: 10,016.029a uktavaty asi dhīrāṇi vākyāni puruṣottamam
analyzed: uktavatī asi dhīrāṇi vākyāni puruṣottamam

original: 10,016.029c kṣatradharmānurūpāṇi tāni saṃsmartum arhasi
analyzed: kṣatra dharma anurūpāṇi tāni saṃsmartum arhasi

original: 10,016.030a hato duryodhanaḥ pāpo rājyasya paripanthakaḥ
analyzed: hataḥ duryodhanaḥ pāpaḥ rājyasya paripanthakaḥ

original: 10,016.030c duḥśāsanasya rudhiraṃ pītaṃ visphurato mayā
analyzed: duḥśāsanasya rudhiram pītam visphurataḥ mayā

original: 10,016.031a vairasya gatam ānṛṇyaṃ na sma vācyā vivakṣatām
analyzed: vairasya gatam ānṛṇyam na sma vācyāḥ vivakṣatām

original: 10,016.031c jitvā mukto droṇaputro brāhmaṇyād gauraveṇa ca
analyzed: jitvā muktaḥ droṇaputraḥ brāhmaṇyāt gauraveṇa ca

original: 10,016.032a yaśo 'sya pātitaṃ devi śarīraṃ tv avaśeṣitam
analyzed: yaśaḥ sya pātitam devi śarīram tu avaśeṣitam

original: 10,016.032c viyojitaś ca maṇinā nyāsitaś cāyudhaṃ bhuvi
analyzed: viyojitaḥ ca maṇinā nyāsitaḥ ca āyudham bhuvi

original: 10,016.033 draupady uvāca
analyzed: draupadī uvāca

original: 10,016.033a kevalānṛṇyam āptāsmi guruputro gurur mama
analyzed: kevala anṛṇyam āptā asmi guru putraḥ guruḥ mama

original: 10,016.033c śirasy etaṃ maṇiṃ rājā pratibadhnātu bhārata
analyzed: śirasi etam maṇim rājā pratibadhnātu bhārata

original: 10,016.034 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
analyzed: vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 10,016.034a taṃ gṛhītvā tato rājā śirasy evākarot tadā
analyzed: tam gṛhītvā tatas rājā śirasi eva akarot tadā

original: 10,016.034c guror ucchiṣṭam ity eva draupadyā vacanād api
analyzed: guroḥ ucchiṣṭam iti eva draupadyāḥ vacanāt api

original: 10,016.035a tato divyaṃ maṇivaraṃ śirasā dhārayan prabhuḥ
analyzed: tatas divyam maṇi varam śirasā dhārayan prabhuḥ

original: 10,016.035c śuśubhe sa mahārājaḥ sacandra iva parvataḥ
analyzed: śuśubhe sa mahā rājaḥ sa candraḥ iva parvataḥ

original: 10,016.036a uttasthau putraśokārtā tataḥ kṛṣṇā manasvinī
analyzed: uttasthau putra śoka ārtā tatas kṛṣṇā manasvinī

original: 10,016.036c kṛṣṇaṃ cāpi mahābāhuṃ paryapṛcchata dharmarāṭ
analyzed: kṛṣṇam ca api mahā bāhum paryapṛcchata dharmarāj

original: 10,017.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
analyzed: vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ uvāca

original: 10,017.001a hateṣu sarvasainyeṣu sauptike tai rathais tribhiḥ
analyzed: hateṣu sarva sainyeṣu sauptike taiḥ rathaiḥ tribhiḥ

original: 10,017.001c śocan yudhiṣṭhiro rājā dāśārham idam abravīt
analyzed: śocan yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā dāśārham idam abravīt

original: 10,017.002a kathaṃ nu kṛṣṇa pāpena kṣudreṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā
analyzed: katham nu kṛṣṇa pāpena kṣudreṇa akliṣṭa karmaṇā

original: 10,017.002c drauṇinā nihatāḥ sarve mama putrā mahārathāḥ
analyzed: drauṇinā nihatāḥ sarve mama putrāḥ mahā rathāḥ

original: 10,017.003a tathā kṛtāstrā vikrāntāḥ sahasraśatayodhinaḥ
analyzed: tathā kṛtāstrāḥ vikrāntāḥ sahasra śata yodhinaḥ

original: 10,017.003c drupadasyātmajāś caiva droṇaputreṇa pātitāḥ
analyzed: drupadasya ātmajāḥ ca eva droṇaputreṇa pātitāḥ

original: 10,017.004a yasya droṇo maheṣvāso na prādād āhave mukham
analyzed: yasya droṇaḥ mahā iṣvāsaḥ na prādāt āhave mukham

original: 10,017.004c taṃ jaghne rathināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ kathaṃ nu saḥ
analyzed: tam jaghne rathinām śreṣṭham dhṛṣṭadyumnam katham nu saḥ

original: 10,017.005a kiṃ nu tena kṛtaṃ karma tathāyuktaṃ nararṣabha
analyzed: kim nu tena kṛtam karma tathā ayuktam nara ṛṣabha

original: 10,017.005c yad ekaḥ śibiraṃ sarvam avadhīn no guroḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: yat ekaḥ śibiram sarvam avadhīt naḥ guroḥ sutaḥ

original: 10,017.006 vāsudeva uvāca
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ uvāca

original: 10,017.006a nūnaṃ sa devadevānām īśvareśvaram avyayam
analyzed: nūnam sa devadevānām īśvara īśvaram avyayam

original: 10,017.006c jagāma śaraṇaṃ drauṇir ekas tenāvadhīd bahūn
analyzed: jagāma śaraṇam drauṇiḥ ekaḥ tena avadhīt bahūn

original: 10,017.007a prasanno hi mahādevo dadyād amaratām api
analyzed: prasannaḥ hi mahādevaḥ dadyāt amara tām api

original: 10,017.007c vīryaṃ ca giriśo dadyād yenendram api śātayet
analyzed: vīryam ca giriśaḥ dadyāt yena indram api śātayet

original: 10,017.008a vedāhaṃ hi mahādevaṃ tattvena bharatarṣabha
analyzed: veda aham hi mahādevam tattvena bharata ṛṣabha

original: 10,017.008c yāni cāsya purāṇāni karmāṇi vividhāny uta
analyzed: yāni ca asya purāṇāni karmāṇi vividhāni uta

original: 10,017.009a ādir eṣa hi bhūtānāṃ madhyam antaś ca bhārata
analyzed: ādiḥ eṣa hi bhūtānām madhyam antaḥ ca bhārata

original: 10,017.009c viceṣṭate jagac cedaṃ sarvam asyaiva karmaṇā
analyzed: viceṣṭate jagat ca idam sarvam asya eva karmaṇā

original: 10,017.010a evaṃ sisṛkṣur bhūtāni dadarśa prathamaṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: evam sisṛkṣuḥ bhūtāni dadarśa prathamam vibhuḥ

original: 10,017.010c pitāmaho 'bravīc cainaṃ bhūtāni sṛja māciram
analyzed: pitāmahaḥ bravīt ca enam bhūtāni sṛja māciram

original: 10,017.011a harikeśas tathety uktvā bhūtānāṃ doṣadarśivān
analyzed: harikeśaḥ tathā iti uktvā bhūtānām doṣa darśivān

original: 10,017.011c dīrghakālaṃ tapas tepe magno 'mbhasi mahātapāḥ
analyzed: dīrgha kālam tapaḥ tepe magnaḥ mbhasi mahā tapāḥ

original: 10,017.012a sumahāntaṃ tataḥ kālaṃ pratīkṣyainaṃ pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: su mahāntam tatas kālam pratīkṣya enam pitāmahaḥ

original: 10,017.012c sraṣṭāraṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ sasarja manasāparam
analyzed: sraṣṭāram sarva bhūtānām sasarja manasā aparam

original: 10,017.013a so 'bravīt pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā giriśaṃ magnam ambhasi
analyzed: saḥ bravīt pitaram dṛṣṭvā giriśam magnam ambhasi

original: 10,017.013c yadi me nāgrajas tv anyas tataḥ srakṣyāmy ahaṃ prajāḥ
analyzed: yadi me na agrajaḥ tu anyaḥ tatas srakṣyāmi aham prajāḥ

original: 10,017.014a tam abravīt pitā nāsti tvad anyaḥ puruṣo 'grajaḥ
analyzed: tam abravīt pitā na asti tvat anyaḥ puruṣaḥ grajaḥ

original: 10,017.014c sthāṇur eṣa jale magno visrabdhaḥ kuru vai kṛtim
analyzed: sthāṇuḥ eṣa jale magnaḥ visrabdhaḥ kuru vai kṛtim

original: 10,017.015a sa bhūtāny asṛjat sapta dakṣādīṃs tu prajāpatīn
analyzed: sa bhūtāni asṛjat sapta dakṣa ādīn tu prajāpatīn

original: 10,017.015c yair imaṃ vyakarot sarvaṃ bhūtagrāmaṃ caturvidham
analyzed: yaiḥ imam vyakarot sarvam bhūta grāmam caturvidham

original: 10,017.016a tāḥ sṛṣṭamātrāḥ kṣudhitāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ prajāpatim
analyzed: tāḥ sṛṣṭa mātrāḥ kṣudhitāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ prajāpatim

original: 10,017.016c bibhakṣayiṣavo rājan sahasā prādravaṃs tadā
analyzed: bibhakṣayiṣavaḥ rājan sahasā prādravan tadā

original: 10,017.017a sa bhakṣyamāṇas trāṇārthī pitāmaham upādravat
analyzed: sa bhakṣyamāṇaḥ trāṇa arthī pitāmaham upādravat

original: 10,017.017c ābhyo māṃ bhagavān pātu vṛttir āsāṃ vidhīyatām
analyzed: ābhyaḥ mām bhagavān pātu vṛttiḥ āsām vidhīyatām

original: 10,017.018a tatas tābhyo dadāv annam oṣadhīḥ sthāvarāṇi ca
analyzed: tatas tābhyaḥ dadau annam oṣadhīḥ sthāvarāṇi ca

original: 10,017.018c jaṅgamāni ca bhūtāni durbalāni balīyasām
analyzed: jaṅgamāni ca bhūtāni durbalāni balīyasām

original: 10,017.019a vihitānnāḥ prajās tās tu jagmus tuṣṭā yathāgatam
analyzed: vihita annāḥ prajāḥ tāḥ tu jagmuḥ tuṣṭāḥ yathāgatam

original: 10,017.019c tato vavṛdhire rājan prītimatyaḥ svayoniṣu
analyzed: tatas vavṛdhire rājan prītimatyaḥ sva yoniṣu

original: 10,017.020a bhūtagrāme vivṛddhe tu tuṣṭe lokagurāv api
analyzed: bhūta grāme vivṛddhe tu tuṣṭe lokagurau api

original: 10,017.020c udatiṣṭhaj jalāj jyeṣṭhaḥ prajāś cemā dadarśa saḥ
analyzed: udatiṣṭhat jalāt jyeṣṭhaḥ prajāḥ ca imāḥ dadarśa saḥ

original: 10,017.021a bahurūpāḥ prajā dṛṣṭvā vivṛddhāḥ svena tejasā
analyzed: bahu rūpāḥ prajāḥ dṛṣṭvā vivṛddhāḥ svena tejasā

original: 10,017.021c cukrodha bhagavān rudro liṅgaṃ svaṃ cāpy avidhyata
analyzed: cukrodha bhagavān rudraḥ liṅgam svam ca api avidhyata

original: 10,017.022a tat praviddhaṃ tadā bhūmau tathaiva pratyatiṣṭhata
analyzed: tat praviddham tadā bhūmau tathā eva pratyatiṣṭhata

original: 10,017.022c tam uvācāvyayo brahmā vacobhiḥ śamayann iva
analyzed: tam uvāca avyayaḥ brahmā vacobhiḥ śamayan iva

original: 10,017.023a kiṃ kṛtaṃ salile śarva cirakālaṃ sthitena te
analyzed: kim kṛtam salile śarva cira kālam sthitena te

original: 10,017.023c kimarthaṃ caitad utpāṭya bhūmau liṅgaṃ praveritam
analyzed: kimartham ca etat utpāṭya bhūmau liṅgam praveritam

original: 10,017.024a so 'bravīj jātasaṃrambhas tadā lokagurur gurum
analyzed: saḥ bravīt jāta saṃrambhaḥ tadā lokaguruḥ gurum

original: 10,017.024c prajāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ pareṇemāḥ kiṃ kariṣyāmy anena vai
analyzed: prajāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ pareṇa imāḥ kim kariṣyāmi anena vai

original: 10,017.025a tapasādhigataṃ cānnaṃ prajārthaṃ me pitāmaha
analyzed: tapasā adhigatam ca annam prajā artham me pitāmaha

original: 10,017.025c oṣadhyaḥ parivarteran yathaiva satataṃ prajāḥ
analyzed: oṣadhyaḥ parivarteran yathā eva satatam prajāḥ

original: 10,017.026a evam uktvā tu saṃkruddho jagāma vimanā bhavaḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tu saṃkruddhaḥ jagāma vimanāḥ bhavaḥ

original: 10,017.026c girer muñjavataḥ pādaṃ tapas taptuṃ mahātapāḥ
analyzed: gireḥ muñjavataḥ pādam tapaḥ taptum mahā tapāḥ

original: 10,018.001 vāsudeva uvāca
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ uvāca

original: 10,018.001a tato devayuge 'tīte devā vai samakalpayan
analyzed: tatas deva yuge tīte devāḥ vai samakalpayan

original: 10,018.001c yajñaṃ vedapramāṇena vidhivad yaṣṭum īpsavaḥ
analyzed: yajñam veda pramāṇena vidhivat yaṣṭum īpsavaḥ

original: 10,018.002a kalpayām āsur avyagrā deśān yajñocitāṃs tataḥ
analyzed: kalpayām āsuḥ avyagrāḥ deśān yajña ucitān tatas

original: 10,018.002c bhāgārhā devatāś caiva yajñiyaṃ dravyam eva ca
analyzed: bhāga arhāḥ devatāḥ ca eva yajñiyam dravyam eva ca

original: 10,018.003a tā vai rudram ajānantyo yāthātathyena devatāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ vai rudram a jānantyaḥ yāthātathyena devatāḥ

original: 10,018.003c nākalpayanta devasya sthāṇor bhāgaṃ narādhipa
analyzed: na akalpayanta devasya sthāṇoḥ bhāgam narādhipa

original: 10,018.004a so 'kalpyamāne bhāge tu kṛttivāsā makhe 'maraiḥ
analyzed: saḥ kalpyamāne bhāge tu kṛttivāsāḥ makhe maraiḥ

original: 10,018.004c tarasā bhāgam anvicchan dhanur ādau sasarja ha
analyzed: tarasā bhāgam anvicchan dhanuḥ ādau sasarja ha

original: 10,018.005a lokayajñaḥ kriyāyajño gṛhayajñaḥ sanātanaḥ
10,018.005c pañcabhūtamayo yajño nṛyajñaś caiva pañcamaḥ
analyzed: pañcabhūta mayaḥ yajñaḥ nṛyajñaḥ ca eva pañcamaḥ

original: 10,018.006a lokayajñena yajñaiṣī kapardī vidadhe dhanuḥ
analyzed: loka yajñena yajña eṣī kapardī vidadhe dhanuḥ

original: 10,018.006c dhanuḥ sṛṣṭam abhūt tasya pañcakiṣkupramāṇataḥ
analyzed: dhanuḥ sṛṣṭam abhūt tasya pañca kiṣku pramāṇataḥ

original: 10,018.007a vaṣaṭkāro 'bhavaj jyā tu dhanuṣas tasya bhārata
analyzed: vaṣaṭkāraḥ bhavat jyā tu dhanuṣaḥ tasya bhārata

original: 10,018.007c yajñāṅgāni ca catvāri tasya saṃhanane 'bhavan
analyzed: yajñāṅgāni ca catvāri tasya saṃhanane bhavan

original: 10,018.008a tataḥ kruddho mahādevas tad upādāya kārmukam
analyzed: tatas kruddhaḥ mahādevaḥ tat upādāya kārmukam

original: 10,018.008c ājagāmātha tatraiva yatra devāḥ samījire
analyzed: ājagāma atha tatra eva yatra devāḥ samījire

original: 10,018.009a tam āttakārmukaṃ dṛṣṭvā brahmacāriṇam avyayam
analyzed: tam ātta kārmukam dṛṣṭvā brahmacāriṇam avyayam

original: 10,018.009c vivyathe pṛthivī devī parvatāś ca cakampire
analyzed: vivyathe pṛthivī devī parvatāḥ ca cakampire

original: 10,018.010a na vavau pavanaś caiva nāgnir jajvāla caidhitaḥ
analyzed: na vavau pavanaḥ ca eva na agniḥ jajvāla ca edhitaḥ

original: 10,018.010c vyabhramac cāpi saṃvignaṃ divi nakṣatramaṇḍalam
analyzed: vyabhramat ca api saṃvignam divi nakṣatra maṇḍalam

original: 10,018.011a na babhau bhāskaraś cāpi somaḥ śrīmuktamaṇḍalaḥ
analyzed: na babhau bhāskaraḥ ca api somaḥ śrī mukta maṇḍalaḥ

original: 10,018.011c timireṇākulaṃ sarvam ākāśaṃ cābhavad vṛtam
analyzed: timireṇa ākulam sarvam ākāśam ca abhavat vṛtam

original: 10,018.012a abhibhūtās tato devā viṣayān na prajajñire
analyzed: abhibhūtāḥ tatas devāḥ viṣayān na prajajñire

original: 10,018.012c na pratyabhāc ca yajñas tān vedā babhraṃśire tadā
analyzed: na pratyabhāt ca yajñaḥ tān vedāḥ babhraṃśire tadā

original: 10,018.013a tataḥ sa yajñaṃ raudreṇa vivyādha hṛdi patriṇā
analyzed: tatas sa yajñam raudreṇa vivyādha hṛdi patriṇā

original: 10,018.013c apakrāntas tato yajño mṛgo bhūtvā sapāvakaḥ
analyzed: apakrāntaḥ tatas yajñaḥ mṛgaḥ bhūtvā sa pāvakaḥ

original: 10,018.014a sa tu tenaiva rūpeṇa divaṃ prāpya vyarocata
analyzed: sa tu tena eva rūpeṇa divam prāpya vyarocata

original: 10,018.014c anvīyamāno rudreṇa yudhiṣṭhira nabhastale
analyzed: anvīyamānaḥ rudreṇa yudhiṣṭhira nabhastale

original: 10,018.015a apakrānte tato yajñe saṃjñā na pratyabhāt surān
analyzed: apakrānte tatas yajñe saṃjñā na pratyabhāt surān

original: 10,018.015c naṣṭasaṃjñeṣu deveṣu na prajñāyata kiṃ cana
analyzed: naṣṭa saṃjñeṣu deveṣu na prajñāyata kim cana

original: 10,018.016a tryambakaḥ savitur bāhū bhagasya nayane tathā
analyzed: tryambakaḥ savituḥ bāhū bhagasya nayane tathā

original: 10,018.016c pūṣṇaś ca daśanān kruddho dhanuṣkoṭyā vyaśātayat
analyzed: pūṣṇaḥ ca daśanān kruddhaḥ dhanuṣkoṭyā vyaśātayat

original: 10,018.017a prādravanta tato devā yajñāṅgāni ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: prādravanta tatas devāḥ yajña aṅgāni ca sarvaśas

original: 10,018.017c ke cit tatraiva ghūrṇanto gatāsava ivābhavan
analyzed: ke cit tatra eva ghūrṇantaḥ gatāsavaḥ iva abhavan

original: 10,018.018a sa tu vidrāvya tat sarvaṃ śitikaṇṭho 'vahasya ca
analyzed: sa tu vidrāvya tat sarvam śitikaṇṭhaḥ vahasya ca

original: 10,018.018c avaṣṭabhya dhanuṣkoṭiṃ rurodha vibudhāṃs tataḥ
analyzed: avaṣṭabhya dhanuṣkoṭim rurodha vibudhān tatas

original: 10,018.019a tato vāg amarair uktā jyāṃ tasya dhanuṣo 'cchinat
analyzed: tatas vāc amaraiḥ uktā jyām tasya chinat

original: 10,018.019c atha tat sahasā rājaṃś chinnajyaṃ visphurad dhanuḥ
analyzed: atha tat sahasā rājan chinna jyam visphurat dhanuḥ

original: 10,018.020a tato vidhanuṣaṃ devā devaśreṣṭham upāgaman
analyzed: tatas devāḥ deva śreṣṭham upāgaman

original: 10,018.020c śaraṇaṃ saha yajñena prasādaṃ cākarot prabhuḥ
analyzed: śaraṇam saha yajñena prasādam ca akarot prabhuḥ

original: 10,018.021a tataḥ prasanno bhagavān prāsyat kopaṃ jalāśaye
analyzed: tatas prasannaḥ bhagavān prāsyat kopam jalāśaye

original: 10,018.021c sa jalaṃ pāvako bhūtvā śoṣayaty aniśaṃ prabho
analyzed: sa jalam pāvakaḥ bhūtvā śoṣayati aniśam prabho

original: 10,018.022a bhagasya nayane caiva bāhū ca savitus tathā
analyzed: bhagasya nayane ca eva bāhū ca savituḥ tathā

original: 10,018.022c prādāt pūṣṇaś ca daśanān punar yajñaṃ ca pāṇḍava
analyzed: prādāt pūṣṇaḥ ca daśanān punar yajñam ca pāṇḍava

original: 10,018.023a tataḥ sarvam idaṃ svasthaṃ babhūva punar eva ha
analyzed: tatas sarvam idam svastham babhūva punar eva ha

original: 10,018.023c sarvāṇi ca havīṃṣy asya devā bhāgam akalpayan
analyzed: sarvāṇi ca havīṃṣi asya devāḥ bhāgam akalpayan

original: 10,018.024a tasmin kruddhe 'bhavat sarvam asvasthaṃ bhuvanaṃ vibho
analyzed: tasmin kruddhe bhavat sarvam asvastham bhuvanam vibho

original: 10,018.024c prasanne ca punaḥ svasthaṃ sa prasanno 'sya vīryavān
analyzed: prasanne ca punar svastham sa vīryavān

original: 10,018.025a tatas te nihatāḥ sarve tava putrā mahārathāḥ
analyzed: tatas te nihatāḥ sarve tava putrāḥ mahā rathāḥ

original: 10,018.025c anye ca bahavaḥ śūrāḥ pāñcālāś ca sahānugāḥ
analyzed: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrāḥ pāñcālāḥ ca saha anugāḥ

original: 10,018.026a na tan manasi kartavyaṃ na hi tad drauṇinā kṛtam
analyzed: na tat manasi kartavyam na hi tat drauṇinā kṛtam

original: 10,018.026c mahādevaprasādaḥ sa kuru kāryam anantaram
analyzed: mahādeva prasādaḥ sa kuru kāryam anantaram
